letter.title: En amma ithu unakana kaditham,
content:
Love u sooooo much Angel Miss u a lotzzzzzz ü•∫ 
Thx for all rombooo thx angel nee en amma enna nalla pathukura neee enkooda vae iru enaku athu pothum The changer of my life Nee enaku fantasy vidavum mela 6 th angel is mine nu ninaikum pothu oru maari tears nikkuthu kannula I have craved  for ur love the love on u never ever stops na sethae ponalum It never stops i will be with always ever and ever unnoda happiness la irukuratha vida nee patta ellam kastam maranthu ini happiness na enna love na enna nu daily each sec of ur life u should be feel loved athu pothum enaku ü•∫ love u angel my life unna kolantha pola appa va paathupa, i will be ur sky ethu naalum enna thadi unna varum .
